content=You can walk pretty much anywhere in 10 min, minibuses to Akdamar and the Kale are even closer. Rooms are small but clean, powerful showers, decent WiFi, no breakfast. Staff doesn't speak English but is rather helpful. Caution: There is a big mosque very close that has even longer and louder calls to prayer than usual in the morning. You may not be able to sleep through them.
